Test TeleportAnchorWithFade (MonoBehaviour id 631718164, m_Script guid 474bcb49853aa07438625e644c072ee6) OnSelectEntered path with fade. Then simulate an XR Select Enter on Fireplace_Traditional (Interactor hovers and selects). Expect: fadeCanvas.QuickFadeIn runs, base.OnSelectEntered invoked (twice per script logic: once immediately, once after fade), and fadeCanvas.QuickFadeOut runs.

Test TeleportAnchorWithFade OnSelectExited path with fade. Ensure: Collider enabled; TeleportAnchorWithFade.teleportTrigger == TeleportTrigger.OnSelectExited; FadeCanvas present. Then simulate XR Select Exit (Interactor releases/deselects Fireplace_Traditional). Expect: fadeCanvas.QuickFadeIn -> base.OnSelectExited -> fadeCanvas.QuickFadeOut.

Test TeleportAnchorWithFade OnActivated path with fade. Then simulate Activate (e.g., press/hold activate input while selected). Expect: fadeCanvas.QuickFadeIn -> base.OnActivated -> fadeCanvas.QuickFadeOut.

Test TeleportAnchorWithFade OnDeactivated path with fade. Ensure: Collider enabled; TeleportAnchorWithFade.teleportTrigger == TeleportTrigger.OnDeactivated; FadeCanvas present; the anchor is selected and currently activated. Then simulate Deactivate (release the activate input). Expect: fadeCanvas.QuickFadeIn -> base.OnDeactivated -> fadeCanvas.QuickFadeOut.
